rob.name: robbery notifications
rob.description: get a dm when someone attempts to rob you

lottery.name: lottery notifications
lottery.description: get a dm when you win the lottery

premium.name: premium notifications
premium.description: get dm notifications for updates on your premium membership

market.name: market notifications
market.description: get a dm when someone buys or fills your market order

voteReminder.name: vote reminders
voteReminder.description:
receive a reminder in your dms when you are able to vote again

+**2**% gamble multiplier
+**5**% sell multiplier

worker.name: worker notifications
worker.description: get a dm when one of your workers has reached full capacity

types.name: only when full
types.description: only receive a notification when all of your workers are full

types.name: all
types.description: receive a notification when any amount of workers are full

booster.name: booster notifications
booster.description: get a dm when one or more of your boosters have expired

payment.name: payment notifications
payment.description: get a dm when someone sends you money or gives you an item

netWorth.name: net worth updates
netWorth.description: get a dm when your net worth changes by the amount set. currently: ${VALUE}

autosellStatus.name: autosell status
autosellStatus.description: get a dm hourly for autosell status (/autosell)

level.name: level notifications
level.description: get a dm when you level up

types.name: only on reward
types.description: only receive a notification when you receive a reward from levelling up

types.name: all
types.description: receive a notification for every level up

farmHealth.name: farm health
farmHealth.description: get a dm when your plants are unhealthy and dying

other.name: miscellaneous
other.description: get a dm for miscellaneous things, such as guild level upgrades

marketConfirm.name: market confirmation
marketConfirm.description: require buying from market confirmation on items more expensive than: ${VALUE} (0 = never)

offers.name: receive offers
offers.description: how many offers do you want to be able to receive at once? current: {VALUE}

leaderboards.name: privacy
leaderboards.description: should your username be shown publicly? disabling will also hide you from the nypsi website

tips.name: tips
tips.description: send occasional tips when you do commands

mentionsGlobal.name: global pings
mentionsGlobal.description: show pings in all servers (that nypsi is in) with $pings
